allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: fix linting and formatting issues

- Fix formatting: add missing newlines to JSON and tsconfig files
- Rename workflow-engine files to kebab-case convention
- Organize imports in agent-runner/src/index.ts
- Convert type-only exports to use ''export type'' syntax
- Prefix unused variables with underscore in examples
- Add readonly modifier to VaultManager client property
- Update all import paths for renamed workflow-engine files
- Fix formatter issues in examples/basic-usage.ts

Fixes linting errors found by ultracite and biome.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
